Title: Lab Access
Description:
As much as I adore skulking in the shadows, the juiciest intel is going to be inside the laboratory of the Grand Splicer.

Of course you'll need the proper pheromones once you're in, but we can take care of that with a little biological forgery.

The nerubian loyalists here are surely on the invite list. Six of their secretions should be enough to disguise the three of us.
ObjectivesText: Collect 6 Loyalist Secretions from nerubian loyalists in the Transformatory area.
CompletionText: If you saw me? No you didn't.
RewardText: Finally! I was waiting for when we'd stumble upon the real intrigue.
